item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 16, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. How dairy robots are changing work for cows and farmers (75 points | 37 comments)
3. Mark Zuckerberg's failed negotiations with the FTC to end Meta's antitrust case (34 points | 28 comments)

23. Whistleblower details how DOGE may have taken sensitive NLRB data (718 points | 363 comments)
24. Fake images that fooled the world (81 points | 37 comments)
25. METS, the Middle English Texts Series (50 points | 2 comments)

27. Cohere Launches Embed 4 (85 points | 41 comments)
28. An Interactive Introduction to Rotors from Geometric Algebra (6 points | discuss)
29. Amazfit activity tracker and watch face asset generation (21 points | 4 comments)
